knimeNode.name: Reference Row Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: The Reference Row Filter allows rows to be filtered from the first table while the second table is used as reference table.

fullDescription.intro: This node allows rows to be filtered from the first table while the second table is used as reference table. Depending on the dialog setting, either the rows from the reference table are included or excluded in the output table.
fullDescription.option: Excludes all rows from in the first table present in the second one; otherwise all rows from the reference table are included in the output table.

ports.dataIn: Table from which rows are to be included or excluded
Table rows which used as reference filter
